drinks.name: Lemon's Mojito
instructions: Muddle the lime and the mint together, creating a mash
Add 1 jigger of white rum
Fill the glass mostly full with crushed ice
Pour club soda or mineral water in to fill the glass
Twirl a bar spoon in the glass to chill
Stir drink while bringing some product further up the glass
Finally, take a sprig of mint, whack it against the side of the glass to express oil, and put the lime in the glass for garnish and odor.

drinks.name: Lemon's Margarita
instructions: put ice in the shaker
put ingredients in the shaker
shake
shake some more
pour into glass
salt the glass (optional)

drinks.name: Simone's Utah Mule
instructions: put some ice in a copper mug
pour in ginger ale
add a splash of grenadine
add a dash of bitters
stir gently to combine
garnish with ginger candy

drinks.name: A Nice Nightcap
instructions: put ice in a rocks glass
then some bourbon cream
sit outside on the porch and relax

drinks.name: The Nero
instructions: cut grapefruit into quarters and juice into the shaker
add ice to the shaker, then add the reposado and St-Germain
light woodchips on fire
once the fire is visible, extinguish it with a rocks glass, trapping the smoke inside
shake the cocktail
the moment you flip the glass over, pour the cocktail into the smoked glass
finish with a dash of angostura and a pinch of salt

drinks.name: Rhubarb Elderflower Fizz
instructions: Dry Shake: In a cocktail shaker, combine gin, rhubarb simple syrup, lemon juice, elderflower liqueur, and egg white (if using). Seal tightly and shake vigorously for about 15-20 seconds without ice.
Wet Shake: Add ice to the shaker and shake again until well-chilled, about 20-30 seconds.
Strain: Double strain the mixture into a chilled highball glass (or a coupe) filled with fresh ice.
Top: Slowly top with chilled club soda until the glass is full and a nice foam head forms.
Garnish: Garnish with a fresh mint sprig, a thin lemon twist, or a few fresh berries.

drinks.name: Lemon's Aviation
instructions: ice in the shaker
add the booze
slice the lemon, and juice half into the shaker
shake shake shake
strain into a glass
garnish with cocktail cherry

drinks.name: Minnesota Vice
instructions: load the shaker with ice, then add the rye, the orange liqueur and the Yuza
shake shake shake
peel off an orange twist, express oil on the rim, then drop twist in the glass
add two ice cubes to the glass
pour contents of cocktail shaker into the glass
fill remainder of glass with soda water
finish with bitters

instructions: Shave the skin off the hunks of ginger
Slice the ginger into discs about the size of a USD quarter
In an empty saucepan, put about $2.50 worth of ginger quarters into the saucepan and add a cinnamon stick.
Fill the rest with cider and heat.
once you have a solid boil, pour the cider thru the strainer into a crockpot, set to low-medium heat.
Each time you transfer the saucepan to the crockpot, squeeze half a lemon into the mixture
Fill a coffee mug about 2/3rds of the way full with cider
Add a shot of the booze of choice
Cut a strip of peel off an orange and twist, place in cup
fill the remainder of the cup with cider
If you have it, add two dashes of Angostura Orange
If you have it, add a candied ginger
Await compliments
